headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Freemode Week: Double GTA$ & RP on Freemode Events and More: Aug 26 - Sept 1
content:
Expand your Maze Bank balance and increase your reputation this week. Freemode Events will be awarding Double GTA$ and RP now through Thursday, September 1st. There are also new discounts on select vehicles and vehicle mods, as well as on weapons and high end weapon finishes including gilded metal, luxury finishes and more.

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
